metadata.name: Pawn
metadata.description:
Sometimes it's feel like there is an invisible force.
The hidden figure that directs the chess game.
With the hands of puppet chess players decides the outcome of the battle.

Wars. 
Revolutions.
Pandemic. 
Economic crisis. 

It seems like someone's having fun playing games where you're just a pawn.

And only question does not let you go: is it so?
Am I really pawn, who can only exclaim with a choked heart: "Please, stop this f@cking shit»? 


ABOUT.

This is the genesis artwork from the «Hiding figures» collection.

To achieve the effect of "liquid watercolor", 17 portrait sketches of different powerful personalities was divided into layers, combined and set in motion by the generative art algorithm.

The more distance you look at the artwork, the clearer outlines and new details are revealed from different angles.

An attentive viewer will see the main reference and meaning of the artwork.

Original file size: ~478mb
Due to Foundation restrictions compresses to ~47mb
3000 x 3000 px
